reviews.review:
Astonishing.... 
Greatest Movie of our time....
A must watch over and over again.....

PHWNOMAL! STAKES WERE NEVER MUCH HIGHER. FANTABULOUS GRAPHICS, CINEMATOGRAPHY IS 10/10 VISUALS ARE BEYOND PERFECT. MISSED THE DESTRUCTION OF XANDAR AND RETRIEVING OF POWER STONE THOUGH.
WATCHIN IT FOR 3RD TIME TOMORROW. THIS YEAR IS GONNA BE SO LONG TO PASS.
A movie that is epic in all sense of the word! It treat eats character with respect and a plot that you can follow.
Amazing and funny movie filled with a sad ending.
A masterclass in how to fit so many characters into one extremely enjoyable movie.

yup ,this was the best experience I've had in a movie theater so far.I honestly feel like I didn't pay enough for such a spectacle .Just thinking about the amount of work put into this movie in terms of special effects makes me exhausted. And I can definitely say that this movie accomplishes everything it presented it self as, going into it. It is fist and far most a Thanos movie . And I personally liked that compared to Thanos and  his quest everything else seemed insignificant .To the point that even I was not allowed to fully  mourn the death of my favorite characters, but somehow feel sad for Thanos ....and also understanding his point of view.All in all I personally rank this as my favorite MCU movie so far score 9.5/10
This movie was awesome on every level a must see. I'm gonna go see it again.

Spoiler Free Review

Came out in Australia yesterday. Saw it last night. 

Absolutely amazing movie. CGI and Acting did not disappoint. Thanos is now officially the very best MCU villain, this movie is more of a Thanos movie TBH. No characters are safe so watch out for that. All I'll say. Only criticism is that some characters got to shine a lot more than others, seemed to me like the Russo Brothers (Directors) had a tough time trying to juggle so many different characters with so many agendas into 150 minutes of run. And that ending straight hyped me for Avengers 4.

9.8/10
